panels.description: List of all deployments on your SageMaker HyperPod cluster

targets.expr: group by (resource_name, resource_type, model_name, model_version, instance_type, model_container_type, model_container_image) (model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"})

count by (resource_name) (count by (resource_name, pod_name) (max_over_time(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

count by (resource_name) (count by (resource_name, node_name) (max_over_time(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

panels.title: List of Active Deployments

panels.description: Incoming requests per deployment per second

targets.expr: rate(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"}[5m])

panels.title: Incoming Request Rate per Deployment

panels.description: Total number of incoming requests successfully served by the model over total number of incoming requests

targets.expr: (1 - ((sum by (resource_name) (rate(model_errors_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"}[5m])) or vector(0)) / sum by (resource_name) (rate(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"}[5m])))) * 100

panels.title: Percentage of Successful Requests

panels.description: Number of requests that were successfully processed by the model vs number of requests that failed to get a response from the model

targets.expr: sum by (resource_name) (increase(model_latency_milliseconds_count{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations", status=~"2.*"}[5m]))

sum by (resource_name) (increase(model_errors_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"}[5m]))

panels.title: Successful Requests vs Failed Requests

panels.description: Number of incoming requests that failed to get a successful response from the deployed model split by error codes.

targets.expr: increase(model_errors_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"}[5m])

panels.title: Count of Failed Requests per Error Code

panels.description: Time it takes for an incoming request to get a successful response from the model

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(model_latency_milliseconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations", status=~"2.*"}[5m])) by (resource_name, le))

panels.title: Latency of Successful Requests

panels.description: Time it takes for the model to send the first byte of response to an incoming request

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(model_ttfb_milliseconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations", status=~"2.*"}[5m])) by (resource_name, le))

panels.title: Time To First Byte (TTFB)

panels.description: Helps to identify if the latency of a response by the model was mainly due to delays in initial processing (first byte)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(model_ttfb_milliseconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations", status=~"2.*"}[5m])) by (resource_name, le)) / histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(model_latency_milliseconds_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations", status=~"2.*"}[5m])) by (resource_name, le))

panels.title: TTFB to Total Latency Ratio

panels.description: Total number of concurrent requests being processed by each deployment

targets.expr: sum by (resource_name) (model_concurrent_requests{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource", method="POST", uri="/invocations"})

panels.title: Total Concurrent Requests

panels.description: Total infrastructure allocation - pods and nodes per deployment

targets.expr: count by (resource_name) (count by (resource_name, pod_name) (max_over_time(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

count by (resource_name) (count by (resource_name, node_name) (max_over_time(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

panels.title: Infrastructure Allocation (Pods & Nodes)

panels.description: Active pods currently receiving incoming requests  per deployment

targets.expr: count by (resource_name) (count by (resource_name, pod_name) (rate(model_invocations_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m]) > 0))

panels.title: Active Pods (Receiving Traffic)

panels.description: Time it takes for the model to create the first token for an incoming request

targets.expr: (histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (resource_name, le) (rate(tgi_request_queue_duration_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m]))) + histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (resource_name, le) (rate(tgi_batch_inference_duration_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",method="prefill", resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))) * 1000

panels.title: Time to First Token (TTFT)

panels.description: Average time it takes for the model to generate two consecutive tokens across all tokens. Determines streaming responsiveness for TGI deployments

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (resource_name, le) (rate(tgi_batch_forward_duration_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",method="decode", resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m]))) * 1000

panels.title: Inter-Token Latency (Decode)

panels.description: Number of tokens generated per second by the model. Represents efficiency and capacity indicator for TGI deployments

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (resource_name, le) (rate(tgi_request_generated_tokens_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

panels.title: Token Throughput

panels.description: Average time it takes for the model to generate every token required to respond to an incoming request

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (resource_name, le) (rate(tgi_request_mean_time_per_token_duration_bucket{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}[5m])))

panels.title: Mean Time Per Token

panels.description: Average time it takes to generate a token per request over last 10 consecutive requests

targets.expr: TokenLatency_p90{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}

panels.title: Mean Token Latency

panels.description: Average number of tokens per second per request over last 10 consecutive requests

targets.expr: TokenThroughput_p90{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}

panels.title: Mean Token Throughput

panels.description: Average total output tokens generated per request over last 10 consecutive requests

targets.expr: OutputTokens_p90{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}

panels.title: Mean Output Tokens per Request

panels.description: Average rolling batch size — indicating concurrency during batching — calculated per request over the last 10 consecutive requests

targets.expr: RollingBatchSize_p90{cluster_id="$cluster_id",resource_type=~"$resourceType", namespace=~"$namespace", resource_name=~"$resource"}

panels.title: Rolling Batch Size
LMI (Large Model Inference) Token Metrics - aggregated over every 10 requests

options.content: To enable additional metrics or troubleshoot issues, refer to the Amazon SageMaker HyperPod observability user guide: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/sagemaker-hyperpod-eks-cluster-observability-cluster.html

Tell us how we can improve your Amazon SageMaker HyperPod observability experience by reporting bugs or submitting feature requests here
https://github.com/aws/amazon-sagemaker-feedback/issues
